properties.areaDesc: Dyer, TN; Obion, TN; Gibson, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:49AM CST until February 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Obion River near Obion
* from Thursday February 13 until Sunday February 16.
* At 09 AM Thursday the stage was 33.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 34.6 feet on Friday February 14.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 13 and
continue to rise to near 34.5 feet by Friday February 14.The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday February 16.
* At 35.0 feet...Several secondary roads and large areas of farm land
are flooded in northern Dyer County. Flooding is occurring around
Rives in southeast Obion County.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
